title: Outdoor safety with the Step2 KidAlert! Outdoor Boundary Net
description: This Step2 Boundary Net will alert little ones to the boundaries of the driveway or playground. This sturdy, visual warning sign comes with a bright fabric net to alert drivers to proceed with caution while children are at play.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
This Step2 Boundary Net will alert little ones to the boundaries of the driveway or playground. This sturdy, visual warning sign comes with a bright fabric net to alert drivers to proceed with caution while children are at play.

To learn more about this kid's at play warning sign, please click here: http://bit.ly/2cE83PD

transcripts: Keeping the fun safe with kid alert boundary net helps little ones recognize their drive way and playground limits. the ten foot bright fabric net connects to two neon kid alert characters to catch all types of balls that accidentally roll away. Both kid alert characters anchor into the ground with four included stakes. And for wider driveways, you can add sand to the feet fro more weight to keep the net tight. Designed to assemble easily, the net rolls up and stores easily in the included storage bag or when playtime is over. Made in the USA with some imported parts. Providing piece of mind during playtime. The kid alert boundary net by Step2.
